multiplechoiceresponse.p: What does the ">" character mean when used with XREADGROUP?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer

choicegroup.choice: Read the message immediately following the last message delivered to the consumer
Read the message immediately following the last message delivered to the consumer group
Read the first message in the stream
Block until a new message is added to the stream

div.p: The ">" character ensure that XREADGROUP will deliver the message that follows the last message delivered to any consumer in the group.
